questions.question: Who is the author of 'Androcles and the Lion'?
questions.answer: George Bernard Shaw

questions.question: Who was Androcles?
questions.answer: A slave

questions.question: Why did Androcles run away?
questions.answer: Cruel master

questions.question: What problem did the lion have?
questions.answer: Thorn in paw

questions.question: How did Androcles help the lion?
questions.answer: Pulled out the thorn

questions.question: Where were Androcles and the lion reunited?
questions.answer: Arena

questions.question: What did the lion do when it saw Androcles?
questions.answer: Recognized and spared him

questions.question: What quality of Androcles is highlighted?
questions.answer: Kindness

questions.question: What is the central message of the story?
questions.answer: Kindness is rewarded

questions.question: Who pardoned Androcles?
questions.answer: The king

questions.question: Why did Androcles run away from his master?
questions.answer: He ran away because his master was cruel and treated him badly.

questions.question: How did Androcles help the lion?
questions.answer: He removed the thorn from the lion’s paw with kindness.

questions.question: What happened when Androcles was brought to the arena?
questions.answer: The lion recognized Androcles and did not harm him.

questions.question: What moral lesson does the story teach?
questions.answer: Kindness and compassion are always rewarded.

questions.question: Why did the king pardon Androcles?
questions.answer: Because the lion spared Androcles showing gratitude.
